title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc. runner with REST and CLI APIs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm install ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama LLM & embeddings to LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama (Maven Central).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational TUI (Rust) that feels like the old IRC clients but for local LLMs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack adding Open-WebUI, Traefik & GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, fine-tune LoRA, multi-modal vision, etc.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client (NuGet: Ollama) supporting chat, generate, embeddings and streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that test or benchmark Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal FastAPI service providing RAG endpoints over Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets users chat with any local Ollama model.
